import lrapi.lr;
import java.sql.Connection;
import java.sql.DriverManager;
import java.sql.PreparedStatement;
import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.SQLException;
public class Actions
{

public int init() throws Throwable {

	return 0;
}//end of init


public int action() throws Throwable {
	//DBManager.getConnection();
	DBManager.insert(40000);//
	return 0;
}//end of action


public int end() throws Throwable {
	return 0;
}//end of end

}
class DBManager{
private static final String DRIVER = "com.mysql.cj.jdbc.Driver";
private static final String URL = "jdbc:mysql://192.168.43.222:3306/test?serverTimezone=UTC&useSSL=false";
private static final String USER = "u1";
private static final String passwd = "123456";
private DBManager() {
}
public static Connection getConnection() {
Connection con = null;
try {
Class.forName(DRIVER).newInstance();
con = DriverManager.getConnection(URL, USER, passwd);
System.out.println("è¿æ¥æˆåŠŸ");
} catch (Exception e) {
throw new RuntimeException("æ— æ³•è¿æ¥æ•°æ®åº“");
}
return con;

}
//æ•°æ®æ’å…¥æ“ä½œ
public static void insert(int dataSize) {
	Connection connection = null;
	PreparedStatement preparedStatement = null;
	connection = DBManager.getConnection();
	String sql = "insert into people(id,username,password) values(?,?,?)";
	try {
		preparedStatement = connection.prepareStatement(sql);
		connection.setAutoCommit(false);//å…³é—­è‡ªåŠ¨æäº¤
		for(int i=1;i<dataSize;i++){
			preparedStatement.setInt(1,i);
			preparedStatement.setString(2, "user"+i);
			preparedStatement.setString(3, "pwd"+i);
			preparedStatement.addBatch();//å¢åŠ æ‰¹å¤„ç†
        //è®¾ç½®æ‰¹å¤„ç†æ•°æ®ç¼“å†²å¤§å°
        	if(i%20000==0){
            	preparedStatement.executeBatch();//
        	}
		}
		connection.commit();
	} catch (SQLException e) {
		e.printStackTrace();
	} 
	/*å…³é—­ä¸æ•°æ®åº“çš„è¿æ¥è¿è¡Œä¼šæŠ¥é”™ï¼Œä½†ä¸ä¼šå½±å“æ•°æ®çš„æ’å…¥æ“ä½œï¼Œä¸è¿‡è¿™é‡Œè¿˜æ˜¯é€‰æ‹©ä¸å…³é—­è¿æ¥
	try {
		connection.close();
		preparedStatement.close();
	} catch (SQLException e) {
		e.printStackTrace();
	}*/
}

}
